SentencePairReader

public SentencePairReader(boolean lowercase,
                          String saveInputDir,
                          String saveRejectsDir)
Creates a sentence pair reader that saves accepted inputs and rejects.

Parameters:
lowercase - Whether to lowercase input.
saveInputDir - Where to save input files.
saveRejectsDir - Where to save rejected files.

readSentencePairsFromSource

public void readSentencePairsFromSource(String path,
                                        int maxSentencePairs,
                                        List<SentencePair> sentencePairs)
Reads translation data (sentence pairs) from a set of parallel files. The files can include several sources of information, including tags, trees and word alignments.

Parameters:
path - Input directory path
maxSentencePairs - Number of sentences to return
sentencePairs - Database of sentence pairs

readSentencePairsFromSource

public void readSentencePairsFromSource(String path,
                                        int offset,
                                        int maxSentencePairs,
                                        List<SentencePair> sentencePairs,
                                        Filter<SentencePair> filter)
Reads translation data (sentence pairs) from a set of parallel files. The files can include several sources of information, including tags, trees and word alignments.

Parameters:
path - Input directory path
offset - Number of sentences to skip at outset
maxSentencePairs - Number of sentences to return
sentencePairs - Database of sentence pairs
filter - Filter for sentence pairs
